013package org.apache.juneau.rest.processor;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.http.HttpHeaders.*;
016
017import java.io.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
020import org.apache.http.*;
021
022/**
023 * Response handler for {@link HttpResponse} objects.
024 *
025 * <ul class='seealso'>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.ResponseProcessors">Response Processors</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029public final class HttpResponseProcessor implements ResponseProcessor {
030
031   @Override /* ResponseProcessor */
032   public int process(RestOpSession opSession) throws IOException {
033
034      RestResponse res = opSession.getResponse();
035      HttpResponse r = res.getContent(HttpResponse.class);
036
037      if (r == null)
038         return NEXT;
039
040      opSession.status(r.getStatusLine());
041
042      HttpEntity e = r.getEntity();
043
044      res.setHeader(e.getContentType());
045      res.setHeader(e.getContentEncoding());
046      long contentLength = e.getContentLength();
047      if (contentLength >= 0)
048         res.setHeader(contentLength(contentLength));
049
050      r.headerIterator().forEachRemaining(x -> res.addHeader((Header)x)); // No iterator involved.
051
052      try (OutputStream os = res.getNegotiatedOutputStream()) {
053         e.writeTo(os);
054         os.flush();
055      }
056
057      return FINISHED;
058   }
059}
060
